doc.title: Corpo immagine
doc.plot: BODY/IMAGE Synopsis: Lara Torre is a reputed art photographer who is preparing an exhibition. She is dissatisfied with her work until she starts working with the young and clueless Walter. Lara gets obsessesed with the image of her young model and create an intimate and affectionate realtionship to him. When she feels betrayed she invites him for a final and dangereous photo session. At the art opening Lara will free herself from her obsession.
